spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room sequence are preserved. However, there is a significant wall misalignment in the Living/Deck area where the sliding door boundary has been simplified into a single wall, losing the indented deck footprint. Toilet-4 and Toilet-3 layouts are slightly merged/simplified. Door swings are missing in several interior transitions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to the 'roof-off' cutaway view and dark neutral background. No text or measurement lines present. Penalty applied for the reinterpretation of the 'Deck' and 'Balcony' areas; the exterior boundaries are filled as interior space rather than maintaining the railing/open-air distinction.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the source, including the specific rug in the living room and the desk in the home office. Scaling is consistent with the room dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints: blocky low-poly geometry, flat shading, no textures, and an orthographic isometric perspective.

detected_errors.description: Wall alignment distortion in the living area; the recessed deck area is flattened into the main room structure.
Missing specific sliding door track details and several internal door swing indicators.
Reinterpretation of balcony spaces as enclosed floor areas rather than exterior structural elements.
